item.title: Rust Journey
item.description: Rust for a non rustacean I’ve always being quite curious about Rust, and it was only a couple of weeks ago that I decided I was going to get serious about learning the language. I’ve heard and read here and there that it was adviced to read The Rust Book (aka The Book) cover to cover before attempting to dive deep into the language.
